name: Water Pump and Water Pump Auto-Off

rules.to: (	   msg.payload.black = "on" or msg.payload.fresh = "on" or msg.payload.gray = "on" or msg.payload.gray2 = "on"	) ? "on" : "off"

name: All tank heaters on if ANY heater is on
send payload to "demo/request" expect reply on the responseTopic set in the inject node
fake external application recieving command and responding to reply topic

props.v: correl sent in msg as a string
correl sent in msg as a string
